response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It is a valuable asset that holds significant worth, and I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its exceptional quality and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $9,500. This price reflects its true value while allowing you to secure a deal that is beneficial for both parties. Should you be interested in exploring this further, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 9500}
